# Event
RME Collaborative Oncology Congress

# Overview & Learning Objectives
- Implement evidence-based strategies for reducing disparities in basal cell carcinoma (BCC) care in rural and underserved settings 
- Differentiate treatment options for BCC based on clinical efficacy and safety data 
- Integrate clinical evidence and current guideline recommendations into treatment plans for patients with BCC 
- Recognize adverse events associated with therapies for BCC to improve adherence to therapy
